Rules.InvariantScript: Set(sortFieldDirection, "asc"); ClearCollect( SortedData, SortByColumns( Table.Data, sortFieldKey, SortOrder.Ascending ) );
Set(sortFieldDirection, "desc"); ClearCollect( SortedData, SortByColumns( Table.Data, sortFieldKey, SortOrder.Descending ) );
Set(sortFieldKey, ThisItem.Value); Set(sortFieldDirection, "asc"); ClearCollect( SortedData, SortByColumns( Table.Data, sortFieldKey, SortOrder.Ascending ) );

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(320, Self.Width - 60), Min(320, Self.Height - 60))

Rules.InvariantScript: LookUp(LookUp(Table.Data, id = ThisItem.ItemId, fields), name = ThisItem.Value, value)

ControlPropertyState.AutoRuleBindingString: If(Self.Layout = Layout.Horizontal, Min(320, Self.Width - 60), Min(320, Self.Height - 60))

Rules.InvariantScript: Table({Value: "SampleStringField", Name: "Sample String Field"},{Value: "SampleNumberField", Name: "Sample Number Field"},{Value: "SampleBooleanField", Name: "Sample Boolean Field"})
Set(sortFieldDirection, "asc"); Set(sortFieldKey, First(Table.Fields).Value); ClearCollect( SortedData, SortByColumns( Table.Data, sortFieldKey, SortOrder.Ascending ) );
